summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Monday 29 November to end of Wednesday 1 December GMT
description: Feeling cold, mainly bright and breezy some showers possible, with fresh winds from the North West throughout. <br/><br/>Little to no import and locally-emitted pollutants will be quickly dispersed.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
